backend/main.mo: Motoko backend actor managing users, profiles, authorization, stories, and storage with access control checks.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing UI regression fixes, related files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing roles of various frontend files and components in the project.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH design tokens for light/dark themes and global element defaults.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entrypoint loading the app root, PWA metadata, icons, and manifest.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining app name, icons, theme colors, start URL, and display settings.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing cache v3 with network-first navigation handling and asset caching.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React app setting up routing, splash screen, onboarding, PWA registration, and UI layout.
frontend/src/components/AdPlaceholder.ts: Ad placeholder component that hides for premium users and shows a styled banner or inline ad.
frontend/src/components/AppDrawer.tsx: Side drawer navigation with main links, story creation, and premium upsell handling based on user state.
frontend/src/components/AppHeader.tsx: Top app header with menu button, logo, and user avatar fetched from profile data.
frontend/src/components/BottomNav.tsx: Fixed bottom tab navigation bar with localized labels and active-state highlighting.
frontend/src/components/ButtonStyleRegre: Dev-only widget rendering multiple Button variants to visually detect styling regressions.
frontend/src/components/CategoryScroller: Horizontally scrollable category list filtered by mode and translated per language settings.
frontend/src/components/ContinueReadingC: Card showing the user’s last-read story with progress and quick navigation to resume reading.
frontend/src/components/DailyStoryNotifi: Dismissible banner announcing a new daily story, hidden for 24 hours after dismissal.
frontend/src/components/InstallPromptBan: PWA install prompt bar offering install and dismiss actions when the app is installable.
frontend/src/components/InterstitialAdMo: Modal interstitial ad with a countdown-enabled continue button, hidden for premium users.
frontend/src/components/LanguageSelector: Dropdown selector for choosing the app’s language from supported options.
frontend/src/components/LegalSupportPage: Layout wrapper for legal/support pages with back navigation and a footer.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Login/logout button using Internet Identity with loading state and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/ModeToggle.tsx: Two-button toggle switching between adults and kids modes with localized labels.
frontend/src/components/MyStoryCard.tsx: Card displaying user's story with cover, localized title, summary, metadata, and edit/read actions.
frontend/src/components/onboarding/Onboa: Implements a three‑step onboarding UI that saves language, mode, and theme preferences and handles navigation, skipping, and completion.
frontend/src/components/onboarding/StepT: Wraps onboarding steps with direction‑based enter animations, respecting reduced‑motion settings.
frontend/src/components/PageLayout.tsx: Layout wrapper applying page spacing, max‑width, and optional title rendering.
frontend/src/components/PremiumBadge.tsx: Renders premium badge in multiple variants using gradient styles and crown icon.
Popover with controls for font size, background theme, and auto‑scroll preferences.
frontend/src/components/ReminderBanner.t: Top reminder banner that appears based on local rules and can be dismissed.
frontend/src/components/RequireAuth.tsx: Gate component showing login UI when user is unauthenticated.
frontend/src/components/RouteErrorFallba: Generic error page with icon, message, and button to navigate home.
frontend/src/components/ShareSheetPlaceh: Share button handling Web Share API or fallback link copy with toast feedback.
frontend/src/components/SplashScreen.tsx: Fullscreen loading splash with app icon, title, taglines, and spinner.
frontend/src/components/StoryCard.tsx: Story card supporting featured mode, localization, premium lock state, and read action.
frontend/src/components/StoryCardSkeleto: Skeleton placeholder mimicking story card layout during loading.
frontend/src/components/TopBanner.tsx: Dismissible top banner with variants and optional icon/description.
Banner prompting translation for unavailable languages with temporary translated state.
frontend/src/components/UserAvatar.tsx: Renders a user avatar with optional image, fallback icon, size variants, and loading overlay.
Provides a context for user interface preferences, initializes them from browser or user data, and syncs updates to backend or local state.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the user's identity, reinitializing and invalidating queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAppUser.ts: Manages authenticated or guest user state, syncing with backend when available and handling preferences, premium status, and notifications.
frontend/src/hooks/useFavorites.ts: Handles adding and removing favorite stories, using backend storage for authenticated users or local storage for guests.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication state, login/logout functions, and identity persistence using Dfinity AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useMyStories.ts: Fetches stories created by the authenticated user using the backend actor when supported.
frontend/src/hooks/useOfflineDownloads.t: Provides localStorage-based offline story downloads, allowing saving, removing, and retrieving stories by ID.
frontend/src/hooks/usePrefersReducedMoti: Detects the user's prefers-reduced-motion system setting and updates on changes.
frontend/src/hooks/usePwaInstallPrompt.t: Manages the PWA install prompt, tracking installability, handling prompts, and respecting dismissal periods.
frontend/src/hooks/useReadingHistory.ts: Tracks reading history and progress for authenticated users or guests, storing data in user state or localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useStories.ts: Fetches story lists, individual stories, and the daily featured story via backend actor with React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/useStoryEditor.ts: Loads and saves stories through the backend, supporting creation, updates, and cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: Fetches and saves user or guest profiles, handling images and syncing with backend or localStorage.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, color variables, dark mode themes, animations, and accessibility focus rules.
frontend/src/lib/covers.ts: Returns a cover image URL based on story category and kid-friendly status.
frontend/src/lib/engagement.ts: Manages engagement data in localStorage, including streaks, badges, shares, and bonus story unlocks.
frontend/src/lib/fonts.ts: Maps UI languages to CSS font classes for proper text rendering.
frontend/src/lib/i18n.ts: Defines supported UI languages and provides localized UI strings for each language.
frontend/src/lib/kidsMode.ts: Provides category filtering and checks to ensure kids‑safe content visibility.
frontend/src/lib/notifications.ts: Handles notification permission checks, requests, and showing test notifications.
frontend/src/lib/onboarding.ts: Stores and retrieves onboarding completion status using localStorage.
frontend/src/lib/profileValidation.ts: Validates usernames and image inputs for user profile settings.
frontend/src/lib/readingProgress.ts: Saves, loads, and clears reading progress per story and computes scroll percentage.
frontend/src/lib/reminders.ts: Stores reminder settings and determines when daily reminders should be shown.
frontend/src/lib/share.ts: Implements sharing functions for the app and stories with Web Share API or clipboard fallback.
frontend/src/lib/storyDraft.ts: Validates story draft form data, calculates word count and read time, and stores custom tags.
frontend/src/lib/storyLanguage.ts: Maps UI languages to backend languages and selects appropriate story content or translation availability.
frontend/src/lib/translatePlaceholder.ts: Generates placeholder translated story content based on English fallback text.
frontend/src/lib/uiPolish.ts: Defines shared UI styling constants for icons, spacing, buttons, layouts, and transitions.
frontend/src/lib/userProfileStorage.ts: Utilities to get, save, and clear a guest user profile in localStorage.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React, React Query, and the InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AboutUs.tsx: Static About Us page with navigation back and descriptive text about the app's mission.
frontend/src/pages/CategoriesTab.tsx: Displays a grid of story categories with images and navigates to category detail pages.
frontend/src/pages/CategoryDetail.tsx: Shows stories for a selected category with loading states, mode toggle, and navigation.
frontend/src/pages/FavoritesTab.tsx: Lists favorited stories or shows an empty‑state message if none exist.
frontend/src/pages/GoPremium.tsx: Premium subscription page with benefits, plan selection, and simulated subscription flow.
frontend/src/pages/HelpAndSupport.tsx: Help and support page offering troubleshooting tips, contact emails, and social links.
frontend/src/pages/HomeTab.tsx: Home screen showing featured stories, categories, continue‑reading, ads, and latest stories.
frontend/src/pages/PremiumSuccess.tsx: Confirmation page after subscribing to Premium with benefits summary and navigation options.
frontend/src/pages/PrivacyPolicy.tsx: Page component rendering the app’s privacy policy with sections on data collection, ads, children’s privacy, contact, and policy updates.
frontend/src/pages/ProfileTab.tsx: User profile management page handling profile loading, editing, notifications, sharing, and listing user-created stories.
frontend/src/pages/SearchTab.tsx: Story search page with text filtering, sorting, and listing stories with loading states.
frontend/src/pages/StoryEditor.tsx: Story creation and editing page supporting text fields, categories, languages, image upload, and read‑time calculation.
frontend/src/pages/StoryReader.tsx: Story reading page with scrolling progress tracking, favorites, sharing, downloads, and reading preferences.
frontend/src/pages/TermsAndConditions.ts: Page component displaying the app’s terms of use, restrictions, premium info, jurisdiction, and contact details.
frontend/src/pwa/registerServiceWorker.t: Registers a service worker, handles updates, triggers skip‑waiting, and reloads the app when a new worker takes control.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL or hash parameters, persist them in sessionStorage, and remove them when needed.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining content paths, safelist classes, theme colors, and plugins.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, known issues, and feature requests related to fixing missing button styling.
